params.commitmentHash: contains the commitmentHash signed by the validators

createFinalBitfield(bytes32,uint256[]).details: Helper to create a final bitfield, with subsampled validator selections

params.bitfield: claiming which validators have signed the commitment
params.commitmentHash: contains the commitmentHash signed by the validators

createInitialBitfield(uint256[],uint256).details: Helper to create an initial validator bitfield.

params.bitsToSet: contains indexes of all signed validators, should be deduplicated

submitFinal((uint32,uint64,(bytes2,bytes.details: Submit a commitment and leaf for final verification

params.bitfield: claiming which validators have signed the commitment
params.commitment: contains the full commitment that was used for the commitmentHash
params.leaf: an MMR leaf provable using the MMR root in the commitment payload
params.leafProofOrder: a bitfield describing the order of each item (left vs right)
params.proofs: a struct containing the data needed to verify all validator signatures

params.bitfield: a bitfield claiming which validators have signed the commitment
params.commitment: contains the commitment signed by the validators
params.proof: a proof that a single validator from currentValidatorSet has signed the commitment

verifyMMRLeafProof(bytes32,bytes32[],uin.details: Verify that the supplied MMR leaf is included in the latest verified MMR root.

params.leafHash: contains the merkle leaf to be verified
params.proofOrder: a bitfield describing the order of each item (left vs right)

documentation.text: @dev Each PayloadItem is a piece of data signed by validators at a particular block.
@dev The ValidatorProof is a proof used to verify a commitment signature
@dev A ticket tracks working state for the interactive submission of new commitments
@dev The MMRLeaf describes the leaf structure of the MMR
@dev The ValidatorSet describes a BEEFY validator set
@dev The ValidatorSetState describes a BEEFY validator set along with signature usage counters
@dev The latest verified MMR root
@dev The block number in the relay chain in which the latest MMR root was emitted
@dev State of the current validator set
@dev State of the next validator set
@dev Pending tickets for commitment submission

@dev Beefy payload id for MMR Root payload items:
 https://github.com/paritytech/substrate/blob/fe1f8ba1c4f23931ae89c1ada35efb3d908b50f5/primitives/consensus/beefy/src/payload.rs#L33

@dev after randaoCommitDelay is reached, relayer must
 call commitPrevRandao within this number of blocks.
 Without this expiration, relayers can roll the dice infinitely to get the subsampling
 they desire.

documentation.text:
@dev Calculates 2/3 majority required for quorum for a given number of validators.
 @param numValidators The number of validators in the validator set.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct BeefyClient.ValidatorSetState storage pointer,address,uint256,bytes32[] calldata) view returns (bool)

documentation.text: @dev Verify commitment using the supplied signature proofs

documentation.text: @dev Basic validation of a ticket for submitFinal

@title BeefyClient
 High-level documentation at https://docs.snowbridge.network/architecture/verification/polkadot
 To submit new commitments, relayers must call the following methods sequentially:
 1. submitInitial: Setup the session for the interactive submission
 2. commitPrevRandao: Commit to a random seed for generating a validator subsampling
 3. createFinalBitfield: Generate the validator subsampling
 4. submitFinal: Complete submission after providing the request validator signatures
